name: Merged Cube - Swap and Switch Color Stack Dice with 10101010 Grid Blocks Game
name_original: Merged Cube - Swap and Switch Color Stack Dice with 10101010 Grid Blocks Game
description:
Fun brain puzzle dice game!!! Bigger Board!!!

This is a block puzzle game. Merge same blocks to get higher blocks on the board.

【Game Features】:
◈ Easy to learn
◈ Different theme to choose: dice, number, letter.
◈ Bigger board!!! 6*6!
◈ No limit times and you can play all the day
◈ Simple and classic UI
◈ More dice combination prepared
◈ Auto save game
◈ Support different device direction
◈ Game Center Support
◈ Social Share Support

We hope you will like it!
Enjoy yourself !!
